prTitle: feat: implement body section with content for simple bolognese website
prBody:
## Summary

Implemented the body section with content for the simple bolognese website as requested in issue #14. This creates a minimal, valid HTML5 document that displays the required message without any CSS or JavaScript.

### Changes Made:
- Updated HTML content from 'I love pizza' to 'I love spagheeti' per project requirements
- Removed all inline CSS styling (background-color) to comply with no-CSS requirement (FR-004)
- Removed footer element to achieve minimal implementation as specified
- Updated page title from 'Test Pizza Page' to 'Simple Spaghetti Website'
- Maintained valid HTML5 structure with proper DOCTYPE, html, head, and body tags

### Requirements Met:
- ✅ FR-001: Single index.html file only
- ✅ FR-002: Valid HTML5 document structure
- ✅ FR-003: Displays exact text "I love spagheeti"
- ✅ FR-004: No CSS styling (inline or external)
- ✅ FR-005: No JavaScript
- ✅ FR-006: No external CSS references
- ✅ FR-007: No external JavaScript references
- ✅ FR-008: Appropriate page title

The implementation is now a minimal, clean HTML5 document that meets all functional requirements specified in the PRD.

Closes #14
